name: Altar's Reap
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"I will secure my revenge on Zendikar one soul at a time."
—Ob Nixilis

name: Angelic Gift
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Angelic Gift enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has flying.
flavor_text: "Zendikar will triumph this day, and our armies will fly with angels."

name: Anticipate
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text: Divining the future is easy when you hold the power to sway it.

name: Belligerent Whiptail
oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Belligerent Whiptail gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Whiptails can sense a traveler's footsteps from a great distance. Measuring that distance has been . . . difficult."
—Jalun, Affa sentry

name: Benthic Infiltrator
oracle_text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of their library.)
Benthic Infiltrator can't be blocked.

name: Blisterpod
oracle_text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
When Blisterpod dies, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor_text: A blisterpod's corpse is a scion's cradle.

name: Boiling Earth
oracle_text:
Boiling Earth deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.
Awaken 4—{6}{R} (If you cast this spell for {6}{R}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

name: Bone Splinters
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.
flavor_text: Vastly outnumbered, the Zendikari found creative ways to even the odds.

name: Brilliant Spectrum
oracle_text: Converge — Draw X cards, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell. Then discard two cards.
flavor_text: There are more sights on Zendikar than the eyes can see.

name: Broodhunter Wurm
flavor_text: The native creatures of Zendikar have adapted to live under rocks and crawl through underbrush in order to avoid the most voracious predators. The Eldrazi have yet to make such adjustments.

name: Call the Scions
oracle_text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Create two 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor_text: Ulamog's progeny swarm the land, draining Zendikar's mana to feed the titan's insatiable hunger.

name: Cliffside Lookout
oracle_text: {4}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Though losses run high among the scouts of the Stone Havens, they never flinch from their duty.

name: Cloud Manta
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: When Emeria's worshippers learned that she was no more than a twisted memory of Emrakul, they abandoned their temples to the god. The deserted shrines now serve as breeding grounds for the mantas.

name: Clutch of Currents
oracle_text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Awaken 3—{4}{U} (If you cast this spell for {4}{U}, also put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

name: Complete Disregard
oracle_text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Exile target creature with power 3 or less.
flavor_text:
"We returned to the field and found poor Len, every detail of his final moment perfectly cast in that awful dust."
—Javad Nasrin, outrider captain

name: Coralhelm Guide
oracle_text: {4}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text:
"She knows every step of this coastline, both above and below the surface, and she has hideouts all along the way. She will get you there."
—Jori En, expedition leader

name: Courier Griffin
oracle_text:
Flying
When Courier Griffin enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"Sea Gate has fallen. Survivors are on the move. Will send another griffin when we find refuge. Stay hidden. Stay safe."
—Message from Tars Olan, kor world-gift

name: Culling Drone
oracle_text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of their library.)
flavor_text: Silence rules Bala Ged, broken only by the skittering of Eldrazi.

name: Demon's Grasp
oracle_text: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Take what solace you can in the knowledge that you will not be here to witness Zendikar's demise."
—Ob Nixilis

name: Dispel
oracle_text: Counter target instant spell.
flavor_text:
"I said we should destroy the Eldrazi. Ugin wanted to return them to stasis. Ugin's arguments were . . . unconvincing."
—Jace Beleren

name: Dominator Drone
oracle_text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of their library.)
When Dominator Drone enters the battlefield, if you control another colorless creature, each opponent loses 2 life.

name: Dutiful Return
oracle_text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: When Malakir's surgeons failed, its death-shamans took over.

name: Earthen Arms
oracle_text:
Put two +1/+1 counters on target permanent.
Awaken 4—{6}{G} (If you cast this spell for {6}{G}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

name: Eldrazi Devastator
oracle_text: Trample
flavor_text:
"No matter how big your champion, theirs is bigger. No matter how great your numbers, theirs are greater. No matter how voracious your appetite, they are hungrier. That is why the Eldrazi will win."
—Kalitas, thrall of Ulamog

name: Eldrazi Skyspawner
oracle_text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Flying
When Eldrazi Skyspawner enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

name: Evolving Wilds
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The Eldrazi may be ruthless, but Zendikar is relentless.

name: Eyeless Watcher
oracle_text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
When Eyeless Watcher enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor_text: Every Eldrazi in Ulamog's lineage is an extension of the titan's will.

name: Felidar Cub
oracle_text: Sacrifice Felidar Cub: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: Felidars that make it through their first year of life can easily live to see a hundred years more.

name: Fertile Thicket
oracle_text:
Fertile Thicket enters the battlefield tapped.
When Fertile Thicket enters the battlefield, you may look at the top five cards of your library. If you do, reveal up to one basic land card from among them, then put that card on top of your library and the rest on the bottom in any order.
{T}: Add {G}.

name: Fortified Rampart
oracle_text: Defender
flavor_text: The refuge's defenses allow new recruits to see lesser Eldrazi up close, steeling their stomachs for what's to come.

name: Geyserfield Stalker
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Geyserfield Stalker gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Ghostly Sentinel
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
flavor_text: Mystics of the Stone Havens call upon the spirits of fallen heroes to defend the refuges.

name: Giant Mantis
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
"I always thought the great insects of Tazeem were frightening until I saw the Eldrazi. Now I welcome the sight of mantises perched in the treetops."
—Ryza, Oran-Rief scout

name: Gideon's Reproach
oracle_text: Gideon's Reproach deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text:
"Suddenly, Gideon was there with us, clearing the way so that we could escape."
—*The War Diaries*

name: Goblin War Paint
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has haste.
flavor_text:
"The Eldrazi may not be intimidated, but if it boosts the goblins' confidence, I see no reason to discourage it."
—Jalun, Affa sentry

name: Grave Birthing
oracle_text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Target opponent exiles a card from their graveyard. You create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.

oracle_text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
When Incubator Drone enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

name: Inspired Charge
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"For the lands you have lost and the beauty that remains, for freedom and the future, we must hold nothing back!"
—Gideon Jura

name: Kalastria Healer
oracle_text: Rally — Whenever Kalastria Healer or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "Time and again, I have demonstrated my skills as a healer. Why, then, are you so ill at ease?"

name: Kalastria Nightwatch
oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, Kalastria Nightwatch gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Kalitas may have returned to mindless servitude beneath the Eldrazi, but we say never again."
—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief

name: Kitesail Scout
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: "The wind in one's hair, the sun on one's back, the joy of open skies . . . the next generation of kor must know this kind of peace."

name: Kor Castigator
oracle_text: Kor Castigator can't be blocked by Eldrazi Scions.
flavor_text:
"He told us not to worry, and he walked into the cavern. The swirling mass of Eldrazi parted to admit him, then closed in his wake."
—Akiri, kor line-slinger

name: Kozilek's Channeler
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
flavor_text:

oracle_text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Whenever you cast a colorless spell, Kozilek's Sentinel gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

oracle_text: {2}{R}: Lavastep Raider gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Goblins were first to see the potential of hedrons in the fight against the Eldrazi, for the magical stones came ready-made with pointy bits.

name: Lifespring Druid
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: "The land is not dead, merely sick. I will nurse it back to health."

name: Lithomancer's Focus

Trample

First strike

Devoid (This card has no color.)

name: Plummet

name: Reckless Cohort

name: Reclaiming Vines
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

"This world tires of its long occupation."
—Nissa Revane

Converge — Creatures your opponents control get -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.

name: Ruin Processor
oracle_text: When you cast this spell, you may put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard. If you do, you gain 5 life.
flavor_text: The Eldrazi continue to sweep through the wastes, compounding destruction that already seemed absolute.

name: Spell Shrivel

name: Stone Haven Medic

name: Sure Strike

name: Swarm Surge

Devoid (This card has no color.)
